name: Etoile George V Jardins

reviews.text: Considering the high rates in Sao Paulo, this is a good, reasonably priced option. The main positive is the apartment style concept - which offers great space and flexibility. The apartments are nicely designed and have everything you would expect (including free WiFi). The location is also good - in a smart, residential part of the city. The main downside is the service - which although friendly, is minimal and many of the staff only speak Portuguese. There is a restaurant - but the food is pretty average and there is not much atmosphere. Certainly, of you want space and like an apartment concept, this is a good option - but if you are looking for a hotel, then you maybe disappointed.
reviews.title: Spacious but with minimal service

reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here for a few months and it was excellent. The staff, food, service and facilities here are wonderful.
reviews.title: Great Apart Hotel... Perfect..

likes.liked: — Everything, location, staff, facilities, food etc
likes.disliked: — You sometimes have the wait to use the 'self-service' laundry, but otherwise perfect!

reviews.text: The location is perfect for those wanting to be in the Jardins area, and is a 10 min walk up to Av Paulista.
reviews.title: Great place to stay

likes.liked: — The hotel location and the size of the appartments

aka: Etoile George V Jardins Sao Paulo, Brazil
description: Etoile George V Jardins is located in a privileged region that allows you to enjoy the city in diferent aspects leading you to enriching experience that only Sao Paulo can offer.
